condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively manage the country programme in the departments of Cochabamba and Pando.

description.narrative:
The Cochabamba Zone Office is advancing results in the departments of Cochabamba and Pando and the municipalities of Independencia, Cochabamba, Chimore, Puerto Villarroel, Villa Tunari, Shinahota, and Cobija. This year, UNICEF's leadership was instrumental in positioning children's rights in the center of the departmental and municipal agendas.
The Cochabamba Zona Office has provided technical assistance and contributed to strengthening departmental and municipal coordination mechanisms and planning processes to advance results in priority areas such as Early Childhood Development and emergency preparedness and response. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2020
